wikipedia_page.main: Robert Bowen Cant (24 July 1915 – 13 September 1997) was a British Labour politician.

response: He was elected as an MP for Stoke-on-Trent Central at the 1983 general election following the retirement of the sitting Labour MP Robert Cant. Fisher held the seat with a majority of 8,250.
